channel.title: [508] BerkyScape
channel.description:
This is basically the comeback of my previous 508 made server, problem with most of my servers are that I lose interest in RSPS so quickly that I don't want to make another thing or just proceed with it. This 508 actually makes me continue on the project itself, because it's a nice base where you / me can start off with.
[b]Features[/b] [i] - Made NPC familiars pointing at you after they've finished following you. - Added NPC Death Animations. (Doesn't always show up) - Added Block animations for players and NPCs. - Made the admin rights easier to obtain & save. - Made some changes which makes the game a little smoother & removed useless scripts. - Cleaned some of the bits in the script itself out. - Removed the idle kick which made you get kicked every 2-3 minutes while being active. - Better saving of playerfiles. [/i]
[b]Todo[/b] [i] - New shop system. - Adding so familiars help you in combat & bunyips heal you in combat. - Adding fully GWD with killcounts for each chamber. - Adding new drops system which will make it possible to add it more easily and spawn. - Adding aggressive NPCs which can follow you for about 6 foots from its spawn location. [/i]
[b]Pictures so far[/b] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/357r8rb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2sbjwg2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/4gngjd.jpg[/img]

item.title: [508] BerkyScape
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Pure Slay, post:35, topic:431084”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=533759.msg3903833#msg3903833 date=1328035328]

My 508 NPC animation list is private, sorry

569 Animation Dump http://privatepaste.com/8c7d4e85b4
[/quote]Thanks, that has some I was missing. Unfortunantly the ±5 thing doesn’t always work, especially when you look at NPCs that are of the same sort of species, and the attack/defend/death emotes aren’t in the client NPC defs

Generally they follow that rule, with the newer revisions (602-614+) they started replacing animations which really through off our ways of finding them easily. As Sinisoul mentioned the most effective way of getting them would to be looking at the models and the different skins associated.[/quote]

NPC Defintion ----> Models —> Model VGroups/TGroups ----> Animation Transparency Change (TGroups)/Translation (VGroups)

Would be the flow on that. I hate using the word skin by the way. That could give you a good group of animations for each model which you can then just focus down into your individual attack, defend, walk etc. Of course a better option would be to label the VGroups then figure out what vertices they are moving (Hand, foot, etc). Which would give you an idea of what type of animation it could be.

Gives me an idea for a new tool.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] BerkyScape
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Pure Slay, post:38, topic:431084”][quote author=Berky-Scape link=topic=533759.msg3903925#msg3903925 date=1328040564]
Are you also able to get 508 animations? If yes could you do it?
[/quote]

When I said nothing started changing out of order until 602-614+ that falls under the assumption that the emotes for 601- would work fine for any revision below that. (Hint: 569 dump will work for your 508)[/quote]
haha! I was right. When 614 came out I noticed DatMaker didn’t recognize any of the animation skins so I figured they changed how they were saved/loaded or used a new system alltogether. Thanks for reassuring my guess emily.

@OP you using the old berkyscape base or…? Sorry if I missed what base you were using.

Read full topic
